basics.shellMode: Shell mode: Execute shell commands via {symbol} (e.g., {example}) or use natural language (e.g. {natural}).
basics.addContext: Add context: Use {symbol} to specify files for context (e.g., {example}) to target specific files or folders.

shortcuts.altLeftRight: Jump through words in the input
shortcuts.ctrlJLinux: New line (Alt+Enter works for certain linux distros)

mcpCommand: Model Context Protocol command (from external servers)
